tool_description: Netherlands postcode validation and address lookup API with 99.99% uptime.
name: Dutch Postcode Validation/Lookup API
title: Dutch Postcode Validation/Lookup API

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Search address with postcode and house number

api_list.name: housenumbers
api_list.description: Get all the house numbers in a given postcode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dutch-postcode-validation-lookup-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/postcode/1011AJ/housenumbers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dutch-postcode-validation-lookup-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dutch-postcode-validation-lookup-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/postcode/{postal_code}/housenumbers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dutch-postcode-validation-lookup-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dutch-postcode-validation-lookup-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/postcode/{postal_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
